articles.title: A gut microbial signature for combination immune checkpoint blockade across cancer types - Nature.com
articles.description: Efforts to identify microbial signatures of response to immune checkpoint blockade suggest that strain-level associations may be cancer type agnostic but cancer therapy specific.

articles.title: Systemic proteome adaptions to 7-day complete caloric restriction in humans - Nature.com
articles.description: The authors describe distinct phases of adaptions in the human plasma proteome to 7 days without food, with profound changes occurring only after 2 days.

articles.title: Scientists Discover Dangerous Ingredients Found In Up To 90% Of US Tattoo Inks - Bored Panda
articles.description: According to new Binghamton University research, the ingredient labels on tattoo ink don’t match the actual contents of the product.
